text: You build applications that store data in multiple AWS services.
With AWS Backup, you can centrally protect your data
and manage compliance of your applications that store data in Amazon FSx file systems,
including Amazon FSx for NetApp ONTAP,
along with other AWS services for storage, database, and compute.
You can protect data in FSx for NetApp ONTAP
and easily recover your application if problems arise.
Additionally, you can automate the auditing of your data protection policies
and prove compliance to auditors using AWS Backupâ€™s built-in reports.
With AWS Backup your data remains protected
and you have the controls to minimize disruptions to your business.
